titleStmt.title: Good things to come, or, A setting forth some of the great things that will contemporize and take place when our Lord Christ shall come again mentioned in the Holy Scriptures ... / by P.G.B.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Praisegod Barbon in NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: stained with print show-through; best copy available for photographing.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
